item.title: Miles Industries Recalls Gas Fireplaces Due to Burn and Laceration Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: Delayed ignition due to pilot degradation can cause gas in the fireplace to accumulate prior to burner ignition.  When ignition takes place, it can cause the glass window to shatter, posing burn and laceration hazards.

item.title: Bio Source Naturals Recalls Wintergreen and Birch Sweet Essential Oils Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirement; Risk of Poisoning (Recall Alert)
item.description: The products contain the substance methyl salicylate which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA).  The packaging of the products are not child resistant, posing a risk of poisoning if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: Triangle Tube Recalls to Repair Gas Boilers Due to Risk of Carbon Monoxide Hazard; One Death Reported; In-Home Remedy May Be Delayed Due To COVID-19 Restrictions Fast Track Recall with Health Canada
item.description: Flue gas can escape from the gas boilers if the vent adapter is not securely reattached to the boiler after maintenance or repair, posing a carbon monoxide poisoning hazard to consumers.

item.title: Polaris Recalls Ranger Off-Road Vehicles and PRO XD and Bobcat Utility Vehicles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: An improperly manufactured clutch component can cause the engine braking feature to fail, resulting in unexpected vehicle motion, posing a crash hazard.

item.title: Bulk Apothecary Recalls Natureâ€™s Oil Wintergreen and Birch Essential Oils Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirement; Risk of Poisoning (Recall Alert)
item.description: The products contain the substance methyl salicylate which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA).  The packaging of the products are not child resistant, posing a risk of poisoning if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: Willis Electric Recalls Home Accents Holiday Artificial Christmas Trees Due to Burn Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Home Depot
item.description: The Christmas treeâ€™s foot-pedal controller can overheat, posing a burn hazard.

item.title: Cookware Company Recalls Greenpan SimmerLite Dutch Ovens Due to Burn and Injury Hazards
item.description: The lid on the dutch oven can explode while it is inside the oven, posing injury and burn hazards to the consumer.

item.title: Manhattan Toy Recalls â€˜Manhattan Ballâ€™ Activity Toys Due to Choking Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Target
item.description: The toyâ€™s plastic tubes can detach from the center ball and release the small silicone teethers that are threaded on the tubes, posing a choking hazard to young children.

item.title: BioMed Balance Recalls Wintergreen and Sweet Birch Essential Oils Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirements; Risk of Poisoning
item.description: The products contain the substance methyl salicylate which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA).  The packaging of the products are not child resistant, posing a risk of poisoning if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: DownEast Outfitters Recalls Folding Mattresses Due to Violation of Federal Mattress Flammability Standard
item.description: The mattresses fail to meet the mandatory federal flammability standard for mattresses, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Polaris Recalls Snowmobiles Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The fuel hose can be improperly secured, posing a fire hazard to consumers.

item.title: Rocky Mountain Bicycles Recalls Non-Electric Instinct, Instinct BC and Pipeline Bicycles with Alloy Frames Due to Fall and Injury Hazards
item.description: The bicycleâ€™s front frame triangle can crack and cause separation of the head tube from the frame, posing fall and injury hazards.

item.title: Nutraceutical Recalls Simplers Botanicals Wintergreen Essential Oil Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirement; Risk of Poisoning
item.description: The product contains the substance methyl salicylate which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA).  The packaging of the product is not child resistant, posing a risk of poisoning if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: Crate and Barrel Recalls Parke Twin and Full Beds Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The headboard on the recalled beds can separate from the side rails, posing a fall hazard.

item.title: DaVinci Recalls Bassinets Due to Fall and Entrapment Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The bassinetâ€™s mattress support can become disengaged, posing fall and entrapment hazards to babies.

item.title: Cooper Lighting Recalls Light Fixtures Due to Injury Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The lenses on the fixture can loosen, separate from the fixture and fall, posing a risk of injury to people below.

item.title: Ananda Apothecary Recalls Essential Oils Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirement; Risk of Poisoning (Recall Alert)
item.description: The products contain the substance methyl salicylate which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA).  The packaging of the products are not child resistant, posing a risk of poisoning if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: Miracle Botanicals Recalls Wintergreen and Birch Essential Oils Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirement; Risk of Poisoning (Recall Alert)
item.description: The products contain the substance methyl salicylate which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA).  The packaging of the products is not child resistant, posing a risk of poisoning if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: RH Recalls Riveted Mesh Floor Lamps Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The lampâ€™s on/off foot switch can overheat, melt or catch fire, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: GloryBee Natural Sweeteners Recalls GloryBee Wintergreen Essential Oil Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirement; Risk of Poisoning
item.description: The product contains the substance methyl salicylate which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA). The packaging of the product is not child resistant, posing a risk of poisoning if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: Lidl US Recalls Silvercrest Bread Makers Due to Electric Shock Hazard
item.description: The bread makerâ€™s lid can become energized, posing an electric shock hazard.

item.title: Pranarom Recalls Wintergreen Essential Oils Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirements; Risk of Poisoning
item.description: The product contains the substance methyl salicylate which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA). The packaging of the product is not child resistant, posing a risk of poisoning if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: Polaris Recalls Ranger and General Utility Vehicles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The throttle can fail to return to the idle position after the engine stalls and is restarted in gear without switching the key to the off position due to a software problem, causing the vehicle to accelerate suddenly, posing a crash hazard to the user.

item.title: Polaris Recalls Phoenix 200 All-Terrain Vehicles ATVs Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The throttle lever stop can fail due to damage during shipping, posing a crash hazard.

item.title: Edens Garden Recalls Wintergreen and Birch Essential Oils Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirements; Risk of Poisoning (Recall Alert)
item.description: The products contain the substance methyl salicylate which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA).  The packaging of the products are not child resistant, posing a risk of poisoning if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: A Better You! Recalls Belecoo Strollers Due to Violation of Federal Stroller and Carriage Safety Standard; Fall, Entrapment and Strangulation Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The recalled strollers violate the federal Carriages and Strollers standard.  A childâ€™s torso can pass through the opening between the activity tray and the seat bottom and his/her head can become entrapped, posing entrapment and strangulation hazards.  The location of the crotch restraint creates a large opening between the seat bottom and the restraint, and it can become detached, posing a fall hazard to children.

item.title: Avalon Furniture Recalls Cottage Town Bedroom Furniture Sold at Rooms To Go Due to Violation of Federal Lead Paint Ban; Risk of Poisoning (Recall Alert)
item.description: The base coat paint used on pieces within the furniture collection contains levels of lead that exceed the federal lead paint standard.  Lead is toxic if ingested by young children and can cause adverse health effects.

item.title: Boy Scouts of America Recalls Cub Scout Activity Pins Due to Violation of the Federal Lead Content Ban
item.description: The pinâ€™s face and shaft contain levels of lead that exceed the federal lead content ban. Lead is toxic if ingested by young children and can cause adverse health issues.

item.title: Costway Recalls Baby Strollers Due to Violation of Federal Stroller and Carriage Safety Standard; Fall, Entrapment and Strangulation Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The recalled strollers violate the Federal Standard for Carriages and Strollers.  A childâ€™s torso can pass through the opening between the activity tray and the seat bottom and his/her head can become entrapped, posing entrapment and strangulation hazards.  The location of the crotch restraint creates a large opening between the seat bottom and the restraint, posing a fall hazard to children.

item.title: The Furniture Connexion Recalls Modavari Forrest Live Edge Benches Due to Fall and Injury Hazards
item.description: The recalled bench can tip over while in use, posing fall and injury hazards to the consumer.

item.title: Modus Furniture Recalls Dressers Due to Tip-Over and Entrapment Hazards: In-Home Remedy May be Delayed Due to COVID-19 Restrictions; Keep Product Away from Children (Recall Alert)
item.description: The recalled dressers are unstable if the mirror is not installed, posing serious tip-over and entrapment hazards that can result in death or injuries to children.  The dressers do not comply with one of the performance requirements of the U.S. voluntary industry standard (ASTM 2057-17).  The tip-over restraint kits do not comply with the performance requirements of the U.S. voluntary industry standard (F3096-14).

item.title: Recreational Off-Highway Vehicles Recalled by American Honda Due to Crash and Injury Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The ROV can move or roll when in the park position, posing crash and injury hazards.

item.title: Lochinvar Recalls Condensing Residential Boilers Due to Risk of Carbon Monoxide Poisoning
item.description: The boilerâ€™s flue grommet can deteriorate and dislodge during use and allow the boiler to emit carbon monoxide, posing a risk of carbon monoxide poisoning.

item.title: Edwards Recalls Mechanical Heat Detectors Due to Failure to Alert to Fire
item.description: The recalled heat detectors can fail to activate in reaction to rising temperatures, posing a risk of failure to alert consumers to a fire.

item.title: Republic Wireless Recalls Relay Charging Cables Due to Overheating and Burn Hazards
item.description: The charging cable can overheat and partially melt, posing a burn hazard.

item.title: Rexair Recalls to Repair Rainbow SRX Vacuums Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The circuit board on the vacuum can spark, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: HON Recalls Office Chairs Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The chairâ€™s back can break, posing fall and injury hazards to the user.

item.title: Davina Wellness Recalls Wintergreen Essential Oil and Essential Oil Blend with Wintergreen Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Packaging Requirement; Risk of Poisoning (Recall Alert)
item.description: The products contain the substance methyl salicylate which must be in child resistant packaging as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act (PPPA).  The packaging of the products is not child resistant, posing a risk of poisoning if the contents are swallowed by young children.

item.title: Bonnsu Recalls Miniware Teething Spoons Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The teething spoon can break in a childâ€™s mouth when being used as a teether, posing a choking hazard to infants.

item.title: Ushio America Recalls Indiglow LED T8 Lamps Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The recalled lamps can overheat causing the glass tube to fall and strike those standing nearby, posing an injury hazard.
